mapper.select: select u.USERNAME,p.projectname,j.name,p.location,p.time,p.money,p.lifeloan,p.ratemoney,p.appendix,p.aduitstate from projectapplication p,subjectType j,usertable u where p.projecttype=j.id and p.userid=u.USERID

select u.USERNAME,p.projectname,j.name,p.location,p.time,p.money,p.lifeloan,p.ratemoney,p.appendix,p.aduitstate from projectapplication p,subjectType j,usertable u where p.projecttype=j.id and p.userid=u.USERID and p.projectname like #{name}

select u.USERNAME,p.projectname,j.name,p.location,p.time,p.money,p.lifeloan,p.ratemoney,p.appendix,p.aduitstate from projectapplication p,subjectType j,usertable u where p.projecttype=j.id and p.userid=u.USERID and to_char(p.time,' yyyy-MM-dd ')>#{0} and to_char(p.time,' yyyy-MM-dd ')< #{1}
